subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Through the first month, Mike Pelfrey and Chan Ho Park have emerged as the clear co-favorites for the No. 5 slot, with each offering evidence as to why the Mets should choose him.
snippet: Through the first month, Mike Pelfrey and Chan Ho Park have emerged as the clear co-favorites for the No. 5 slot, with each offering evidence as to why the Mets should choose him.
